subject: Hello from {{user_name}} ({{event_name}})
message:
Hi {{first_name}},

It was a pleasure talking with you last night at {{event_name}}. It was so interesting to learn {{learning_point}}. As for grabbing a coffee some time, I'd love to take you up on that!

Do you have any availability this or next week? Good times for me are {{availability}}, but I will be glad to work around your schedule. Let me know if there are any days or times that work for you.

Best,

{{user_name}}
